thread.title: John Petrucci: Everyone Plays Guitar These Days, It's Absolutely Crucial To Be Unique [News]
thread.title_full: John Petrucci: Everyone Plays Guitar These Days, It's Absolutely Crucial To Be Unique [News]

title: John Petrucci: Everyone Plays Guitar These Days, It's Absolutely Crucial To Be Unique [News]
text:
Posted 13 hours ago 7 
Dream Theater guitar mastermind John Petrucci stressed the importance of being distinguishable as a musician these days due to so many people out there playing guitar, and doing it well. 
He told Warner Music Italy : "It's different for everybody. For me, I was a student of the guitar very young - I gravitated towards wanting to know as much about guitar as I could. I went to Berklee College of Music, I studied music... 
"So that's my personal thing, it's important to me. But the identity thing, it's really important for everybody because there's so many guitar players. Everybody plays guitar! Who doesn't play guitar? [Asks people behind the scene] You play guitar? You play guitar? [Chuckles] Having a unique voice on the instrument is the thing that separates you from the crowd. 
"It's hard to say how to actually do that, I'm not sure there's a learned way to get your own style. Some people just happen to have it."
